sub_title: Reduce your organization's complexity with 𝙩𝙝𝙚 𝙐𝙎𝙈 𝙈𝙚𝙩𝙝𝙤𝙙 for a customer-driven 𝙀𝙣𝙩𝙚𝙧𝙥𝙧𝙞𝙨𝙚 𝙎𝙚𝙧𝙫𝙞𝙘𝙚 𝙈𝙖𝙣𝙖𝙜𝙚𝙢𝙚𝙣𝙩 𝙨𝙩𝙧𝙖𝙩𝙚𝙜𝙮: a unique proposition for sustainable service delivery
summary:
The dot on my horizon: stimulating the development of Service Management knowledge - through Service Management Architecture (SMA) and Service Management Systems (SMS). My road towards that goal: the Unified Service Management method (USM). Read a free e-book here: https://usm-portal.com/productcategorie/books/?lang=en

REDUCING COMPLEXITY
Simplicity is my middle name. I will demonstrate to you how simple most problems can be solved. Reducing complexity is one of my most strategic assets.

ACTIVITIES
I'm an independent entrepreneur, author, presenter, trainer, and publisher. I enjoy serving the SURVUZ Foundation and managing dozens of LinkedIn groups. 
With a thousand knowledgeable authors and numerous reviewers, I produced 100+ books in 16 languages, with only one goal: to inspire you. Once you are inspired, please put the books back in their rightful position: the bookshelf. They are not meant to be used as bibles.

INVITATION
If you think I can contribute to your organization, let's link and see where it takes us. 
=========  voor een NL-versie van mijn profiel zet je de LI-instelling op 'Nederlands'  ===========

treasury_media.title: Een inleiding in USM [USM e-book]
treasury_media.description: Om een continu en consistent verbeterende serviceorganisatie te worden, hebt u een gestructureerde aanpak nodig voor het beheer van uw klanten, uw partners en andere stakeholders, uw medewerkers, uw processen, uw technologie en uw services. USM levert de servicemanagementarchitectuur voor een standaard servicemanagementsysteem.

profile_positions.company: SURVUZ Foundation - governer of the USM Method
profile_positions.description:
The SURVUZ Foundation governs the Unified Service Management (USM) method: a method based on a standardized management system for service organizations or teams.
SURVUZ oversees an ecosystem of professionals that support the USM method.
USM is designed to support service organizations of any size, in any line of business, including ICT, real estate management, HRM, telcos, health, municipalities, or any other. Information: USM portal (https://usm-portal.com/usm-library/?lang=en)
profile_positions.title: Chair

company.name: Inform-IT: Knowledge Center for Service Management

profile_positions.description:
I designed, developed and produced 100+ books, in up to 16 languages, with thousands of experts from all over the world but sometimes alone.
Managed 100+ events in the field of IT Management.
Created and managed several professional communities and knowledge platforms.
profile_positions.title: Director

profile_positions.description: Meeting people and making the world a little bit nicer through social projects, that is the core of ConnectingFriends.
profile_positions.title: Board member

profile_positions.description: The 'Circle of Integration' is a project to tackle the invisible problem of long-waiting and illegal refugees in the Netherlands. The proposal is based on the successful Canadian concept 'Group of Five'.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description: ITWNET (short for ITWorldNET) is the Global IT Professionals Community, a sister community to CIONET.
profile_positions.title: Founding Partner

profile_positions.description:
Founder and  Chief Editor of the ITSM Portal, the very first knowledge portal on IT Service Management. Started in 1996 as the "IT Beheerplein" (in Dutch), an initiative of Dirk Jan van der Hoven and Jan van Bon, and continued as the independent non-profit international ITSM PORTAL (in English, Dutch, and at some time in Chinese).
*** End of 2015, the ITSM Portal was absorbed by the initiative of the SURVUZ Foundation, developing and sharing structured knowledge on service management.**
profile_positions.title: Chief Editor & LinkedIn group manager

profile_positions.description:
Co-developer of the ISM Method (Integrated Service Management_tm), the standard management instrument for organizing IT service organizations, as well as the FSM Method (Functional Service Management_tm). Responsible for all educational matters of the ISM & FSM Method, and for supporting Quality Management Systems like ISO20000, ISO27000, NEN7510, COBIT, etc.
Note: Servitect was previously known as BHVB (Bureau Hoving & Van Bon) and changed its name in 2013.
profile_positions.title: Co Owner

profile_positions.description: Syllabuzz was an organization for Community Development. Syllabuzz developed, delivered, and managed platforms for knowledge communities.
profile_positions.title: Director

profile_positions.description: Co-initiator and manager of the annual Northern IT Event and the community platform of IT professionals in the northern provinces of the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Program Chair

volunteer_experiences.description: De Stichting maakt de methode voor tekststrategie 'Drie Denkstappen naar Sterke Teksten' beschikbaar via het onderwijs en andere organisaties die effectief comminuceren nastreven, deelt daartoe kennis en ervaring, en stelt de tool voor tekststrategie TVF, lesmateriaal en online oefensessies gratis beschikbaar stellen.
Organisatie van reünie, open dagen, website, boek, drukwerk en media. https://oud-peelo.usm-portal.com/
Mensen ontmoeten en samen de wereld een klein beetje mooier maken via sociale projecten, dát is de kern van ConnectingFriends.

Mede-oprichter in 1992. Na vele jaren de rol van secretaris te hebben vervuld, nu verantwoordelijk voor het wildbeheerplan en de organisatie van tellingen en rapportages in het Noordelijk Westerkwartier, t.b.v. het bevorderen van een evenwichtige wildstand, waarbij de belangen van landbouw, natuurbescherming, verkeersveiligheid, en jacht zo goed mogelijk worden gediend.
Setting up the second local itSMF in the world. Creating a large community, organizing many knowledge exchange events, and producing a large number of publications.
Secretaris en vertegenwoordiger van de WBE's in de RAC, voor de Stichting Faunabeheereenheid Groningen, met als doel het beheer van een gezonde en veilige stand van reeën in de provincie Groningen.

volunteer_experiences.role: Member of the Expert Panel on Management
volunteer_experiences.description: Member of the Expert Panel on the topic Management, for Dutch national ICT Magazine "Computable".

volunteer_experiences.role: Member of Advisory Panel IT Management
volunteer_experiences.description: For the chair of honorary professor Philip Powell, professor of Operational Information Systems at the Groningen University. The Advisory Panel was in existence for one year.
